name: Zombie Extraction (Ben Leaver)
description:
Zombie Extraction:

Zombie extraction is a 2D top-down shooter base defence game with a twist - when your mining drill dies you will not lose! Instead, you will be cut off from most of your income forcing you to adopt a more risky playstyle in order to survive. 

Story:

The world has been taken over by zombies, turning it into an apocalyptic wasteland. With 99% of the world’s population wiped out, there is no competition for your mining company, Zombore Mining Corporation. 

However, mining in an apocalyptic wasteland has its disadvantages – namely thousands of zombies trying to kill you! 

Over time, more zombies will be attracted to the site of the mining. Don’t worry though, you can invest your money into upgrades to ensure your survival. Survive, Mine and most importantly, get rich!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - Move

Left mouse button - Shoot

E - Toggle upgrades

Improvements:

This game is an improved version of the game Zombie Chaos made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, featuring: 

-More zombies 

-More upgrades

-A boss fight and 50 waves

-Better menu system

-Difficulty select

-Improved art and more detailed environment

Let me know in the comments if you have played the game and have any feedback, so that I can improve my games in the future! 

Also comment if you have any ideas I could add to the game - I am not planning to add much more but if you let me know you are interested then I might be able to add some of your ideas (if I have time).
